kw.name: Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=serverest, url=https://serverest.dev, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=120, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0

kw.name: Fazer Login e Salvar Token
Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.
kw.msg: ${body} = {'email': 'admin-nsrrzofv@qa.com', 'password': 'senhaforte'}

kw.name: POST On Session
kw.doc: Sends a POST request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.msg: POST Request : url=https://serverest.dev/login path_url=/login headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.31.0', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '60', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"email": "admin-nsrrzofv@qa.com", "password": "senhaforte"}'

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Set Global Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available globally in all tests and suites.
